name: Viking Rituals
description:
Game developed in 48 hours for the Global Game Jam 2016 (GGJ16: http://globalgamejam.org/2016/games/viking-rituals). Theme: "Ritual".

Winner of the game industry jury special award.

Made with Unity.

Description

Take care of your Viking world! Here, you will participate in all sort of Viking traditions such as fishing, sea fights, play beautiful melodies and even jump bonfires; all for the hapiness of your people and the good old Viking civilization! They count on you for this, don't let them down!

Viking Rituals is the sum of 4 mini-games, where each one of them is based on a popular game such as Simon Says or Whack A Mole; taking into account only their core mechanics and adapting them to Vikings' customs.

Personal contribution

Coding

  • Mini-game #3 (sword icon): Naval battle.
  • Mini-game #4 (flower icon): Fishing.

Project

  • Repository management (GitHub).
  • Team management and coordination.
